00:01:36,880 --> 00:01:38,270

Qiu Ling

00:01:39,720 --> 00:01:42,470

Ini...

49

Apa yang dikatakan Zi Yan ternyata tidak salah

50
00:04:36,880 --> 00:04:39,470
Di dalam Three Thousand Burning Flame terdapat segel Naga

51
00:04:40,600 --> 00:04:44,230
Three Thousand Burning Flame yang terjebak telah jatuh ke dalam tidur

52
00:04:44,920 --> 00:04:47,550
Kalian masing-masing memiliki satu kesempatan untuk menaklukkan

00:04:49,400 --> 00:04:50,670

Xiao Yan

00:04:57,960 --> 00:04:59,510
Kau adalah juara Konferensi Pil kali ini

00:05:00,400 --> 00:05:01,190

59
00:05:32,440 --> 00:05:33,310
Sungguh aneh

60
00:05:33,600 --> 00:05:36,150
Sebagai Api Surgawi namun bisa memancarkan tekanan naga yang begitu kuat

61
00:05:36,760 --> 00:05:37,910
Sekilas melihat,

62
00:05:38,240 --> 00:05:41,150

Xiao Yan

wkwkwkwkwkwk

Majikan

00:08:03,160 --> 00:08:05,270
Majikan

00:08:05,320 --> 00:08:08,390

107
00:08:08,880 --> 00:08:10,030
Karena aku juga akan memiliki rumah

108
00:08:10,640 --> 00:08:12,750

109
00:08:13,480 --> 00:08:15,310

00:08:15,720 --> 00:08:17,270

115
00:08:39,320 --> 00:08:40,110
Makhluk ini,

sepertinya selama ini sudah cukup menderita akibat larangan dari Pagoda Pil,

dan kini berada di ambang ledakan.

00:08:49,920 --> 00:08:50,710

00:09:01,320 --> 00:09:02,350
Itu tidak bagus

00:09:05,120 --> 00:09:06,910

126
00:09:08,560 --> 00:09:09,510

00:09:09,720 --> 00:09:10,750
Mari kita ke yang berikutnya

00:09:16,120 --> 00:09:16,670

129
00:09:16,920 --> 00:09:18,550

130
00:09:20,520 --> 00:09:21,110
Mu Gu

131
00:09:21,720 --> 00:09:23,310
Sebaiknya kau tidak berpura-pura

132
00:09:23,920 --> 00:09:26,230
Jika aku bisa menaklukkan Three Thousand Burning Flame

133
00:09:26,720 --> 00:09:29,190
Aku juga bisa menghilangkan ancaman besar untuk Pagoda Pil

134
00:09:29,720 --> 00:09:30,510

135
00:09:53,080 --> 00:09:55,630
Datang lagi orang bodoh

136
00:09:58,760 --> 00:10:00,790

137
00:10:04,440 --> 00:10:05,990

138
00:10:29,320 --> 00:10:30,670
Sepertinya dia juga gagal

139
00:10:33,200 --> 00:10:33,830
Mu Gu

140
00:10:34,200 --> 00:10:34,990
Kau mundur saja

141
00:10:48,800 --> 00:10:49,190
Ying'er

142
00:10:49,720 --> 00:10:50,150
Saatnya kau

00:10:51,720 --> 00:10:52,590

00:10:55,440 --> 00:10:55,910
Mu Gu

146
00:10:56,120 --> 00:10:56,670

00:10:58,320 --> 00:10:58,750
Ledakan

Pagoda Pil

00:11:13,120 --> 00:11:14,630

00:11:15,200 --> 00:11:18,510

151
00:11:27,760 --> 00:11:29,390
Three Thousand Burning Flame terbangun

152
00:11:29,880 --> 00:11:30,310
Buruk

153
00:11:31,200 --> 00:11:31,710
Xiao Yan

154
00:11:32,000 --> 00:11:33,710
Cepat pecahkan bola giok dan beri tahu ketua

155
00:11:34,040 --> 00:11:36,110
Aku akan menahan Three Thousand Burning Flame agar tidak melepaskan segel

156
00:11:43,760 --> 00:11:44,950
Aku sudah menduga kalian tak beres

157
00:11:46,280 --> 00:11:47,190
Xiao Yan

158
00:11:47,720 --> 00:11:49,470
Kalau kau mengirim sinyal, lalu bagaimana?

159
00:11:49,920 --> 00:11:54,510
Ketua yang kalian hormati seharusnya sedang berjuang mempertahankan Wilayah Bintang

160
00:11:54,760 --> 00:11:55,710
Jangan terlalu percaya diri

161
00:11:56,160 --> 00:11:58,710
Para ahli Pagoda Pil akan segera datang untuk membantu

162
00:12:00,160 --> 00:12:03,910
Aku mendengar sekarang Kota Suci Pil dalam kekacauan

163
00:12:04,520 --> 00:12:06,110
Para ahli Pagoda Pil

164
00:12:06,400 --> 00:12:08,390
Sepertinya tidak bisa merapat

165
00:12:13,080 --> 00:12:14,750
Tampaknya Hall Of Soul siap untuk operasi hari ini,

166
00:12:15,160 --> 00:12:16,390
Telah mempersiapkan segalanya dengan baik

167
00:12:42,600 --> 00:12:44,870
Pertunjukan besar yang disiapkan oleh Hall Of Soul,

168
00:12:45,400 --> 00:12:47,230
Jangan sampai kau menghancurkannya

169
00:12:47,560 --> 00:12:52,390
Pagoda Pil tidak akan mengizinkan Hall Of Soul mengorbankan Kota Suci Pil untuk Three Thousand Burning Flame

170
00:13:16,640 --> 00:13:16,910
Buruk!

171
00:13:17,440 --> 00:13:19,390
Segel Three Thousand Burning Flame mulai runtuh

172
00:13:42,120 --> 00:13:44,150
Keadaan di dalam tidak baik

173
00:13:48,520 --> 00:13:49,990
Hall Of Soul mengirimkan begitu banyak orang

174
00:13:50,680 --> 00:13:52,870
Orang-orang kami semua terhalang dalam pertempuran

175
00:13:56,670 --> 00:13:59,110
Segera bantu buka segel Api Surgawi itu!

176
00:13:59,800 --> 00:14:00,230
Iya!

177
00:14:09,000 --> 00:14:09,670
Melindungi Pagoda Pil,

178
00:14:09,720 --> 00:14:10,510
Bagaimana bisa tanpa kami

179
00:14:25,480 --> 00:14:26,230
Mu Gu

180
00:14:26,320 --> 00:14:27,580
Mati sajalah!

181
00:14:48,800 --> 00:14:51,310
Jika Pagoda Pil tidak bisa mengatasi Api Surgawi ini,

182
00:14:51,720 --> 00:14:53,510
Lebih baik serahkan pada Hall Of Soul

183
00:15:06,800 --> 00:15:07,270
Hati-hati!

184
00:15:26,640 --> 00:15:27,510
Segel Jiwa

185
00:15:42,720 --> 00:15:43,270
Jangan bergerak!

186
00:15:58,440 --> 00:16:00,720
Api Liu He

187
00:16:11,720 --> 00:16:12,510
Bantu Tetua Qiu Ling!

00:16:37,360 --> 00:16:38,550

3
00:00:04,400 --> 00:00:05,990
Babak ketiga Konferensi Pil.

4
00:00:06,400 --> 00:00:09,830
Xiao Yan menggunakan teknik rahasia Yao Chen untuk meningkatkan jiwa.

5
00:00:10,120 --> 00:00:13,630
Berhasil menaikkan Petir Pil Tiga Warna menjadi Petir Pil Lima Warna.

6
00:00:14,160 --> 00:00:17,110
Akhirnya, Xiao Yan berhasil meracik pil Kelas 8.

7
00:00:17,440 --> 00:00:20,790
Menjadi juara sejati Konferensi Pil kali ini.

8
00:00:20,920 --> 00:00:23,950
Mewarisi kejayaan guru, Yao Chen.

9
00:00:24,680 --> 00:00:27,670
Meskipun juara Konferensi Pil tidak jatuh ke tangan Hall Of Soul.

10
00:00:27,920 --> 00:00:30,350
Namun, kemenangan atas Three Thousand Burning Flame dikhawatirkan.

11
00:00:30,520 --> 00:00:33,110
Para Ketua Pagoda Pil.

12
00:00:33,920 --> 00:00:37,310
Sementara itu, Xiao Yan yang mengincar Three Thousand Burning Flame.

13
00:00:37,520 --> 00:00:41,590
Berhasil mendapatkan segel Naga Kuno dari Zi Yan.

14
00:00:42,120 --> 00:00:42,950
Namun tanpa disadari,

15
00:00:43,240 --> 00:00:48,390
Three Thousand Burning Flame yang sudah memiliki kecerdasan akan mengguncang dunia.

16
00:01:15,040 --> 00:01:18,750
Pagoda Pil yang terkenal, sepertinya hanya begitu.

17
00:01:20,800 --> 00:01:25,510
Aku sebenarnya cukup suka melihat kalian yang tidak suka padaku tetapi tidak bisa mengalahkanku.

18
00:01:28,280 --> 00:01:29,150
Bajingan tua.

19
00:01:29,800 --> 00:01:31,430
Begitu aku menaklukkan Three Thousand Burning Flame.

20
00:01:31,920 --> 00:01:33,230
Akan kutuntaskan semua ini.

21
00:01:36,880 --> 00:01:38,270
Ini adalah Tetua Agung Pagoda Pil,

22
00:01:38,440 --> 00:01:38,910
Qiu Ling.

23
00:01:39,720 --> 00:01:42,470
Dia yang akan memimpin kalian memasuki Wilayah Bintang.

24
00:01:44,320 --> 00:01:45,630
Setelah masuk Wilayah Bintang,

25
00:01:46,040 --> 00:01:47,830
Jika ada yang tidak mematuhi perintah,

26
00:01:48,000 --> 00:01:50,710
Aku berhak untuk mengusir mereka.

27
00:01:50,960 --> 00:01:52,710
Atau bahkan membunuh.

28
00:01:55,720 --> 00:01:56,270
Mengerti!

29
00:01:59,160 --> 00:01:59,870
Mari kita mulai.

30
00:02:26,760 --> 00:02:28,230
Terima kasih kepada ketiga ketua.

31
00:02:30,360 --> 00:02:31,070
Sekarang,

32
00:02:31,400 --> 00:02:32,870
Mari semua masuk bersamaku.

33
00:02:43,710 --> 00:02:44,190
Semuanya.

34
00:02:44,720 --> 00:02:45,510
Mulai hari ini,

35
00:02:45,920 --> 00:02:47,710
Kita harus bersiap sepenuhnya.

36
00:02:48,120 --> 00:02:48,910
Untuk berjaga-jaga.

37
00:02:49,920 --> 00:02:52,030
Para ahli Pagoda Pil sudah siap sedia.

38
00:02:52,560 --> 00:02:53,710
Jika terjadi sesuatu,

39
00:02:53,840 --> 00:02:55,070
Akan segera datang membantu.

40
00:02:57,160 --> 00:02:59,100
Semoga semuanya berjalan lancar.

41
00:03:11,320 --> 00:03:12,390
Inikah Wilayah Bintang?

42
00:03:14,000 --> 00:03:14,830
Sungguh megah.

43
00:03:14,840 --> 00:03:15,710
Iya, betul.

44
00:03:20,680 --> 00:03:21,230
Sepertinya,

45
00:03:21,600 --> 00:03:23,310
Semakin dekat dengan Three Thousand Burning Flame.

46
00:03:28,320 --> 00:03:28,750
Sampai.

47
00:04:25,940 --> 00:04:26,310
Ini...

48
00:04:26,920 --> 00:04:28,270
Adalah Three Thousand Burning Flame.

49
00:04:34,840 --> 00:04:36,270
Apa yang dikatakan Zi Yan ternyata tidak salah.

50
00:04:36,880 --> 00:04:39,470
Di dalam Three Thousand Burning Flame terdapat segel Naga.

34

35

37
00:05:17,840 --> 00:05:19,070

38

39

40

离三千焱炎火越来越近了 -> Semakin dekat dengan Three Thousand Burning Flame.

45
00:06:49,940 --> 00:06:50,310

46

便是三千焱炎火 -> Adalah Three Thousand Burning Flame.

47
00:06:58,840 --> 00:07:00,270
紫研所言果然没错 -> Perkataan Zi Yan ternyata benar.

48
00:07:00,880 --> 00:07:03,470

49
00:07:04,600 --> 00:07:08,230
被封印的三千焱炎火已经陷入沉睡 -> Three Thousand Burning Flame yang tersegel telah tertidur lelap.

50
00:07:08,920 --> 00:07:11,550

51
00:07:12,360 --> 00:07:12,790

52
00:07:13,400 --> 00:07:14,670

53
00:07:15,040 --> 00:07:16,590

54
00:07:20,880 --> 00:07:21,350

55
00:07:21,960 --> 00:07:23,510
你是本届丹会冠军 -> Kau adalah juara Konferensi Pil kali ini.

56

57

58

59
00:08:00,760 --> 00:08:01,910

60
00:08:02,240 --> 00:08:05,150

61
00:08:06,480 --> 00:08:07,190
萧炎 -> Xiao Yan.

62
00:08:07,840 --> 00:08:11,310
把你的手掌放于三千焱炎火额头处 -> Tempatkan telapak tanganmu di dahi Three Thousand Burning Flame.

63
00:08:11,560 --> 00:08:12,750

64
00:08:16,320 --> 00:08:19,750

65
00:08:28,040 --> 00:08:29,110

66
00:08:39,760 --> 00:08:42,870

67
00:08:43,200 --> 00:08:45,310
人类总是这么贪婪 -> Manusia selalu serakah.

68
00:08:45,520 --> 00:08:48,270
总以为力量可以被征服 -> Selalu mengira kekuatan bisa ditaklukkan.

69

力量之所以存在 -> Kekuatan ada,

70
00:08:50,320 --> 00:08:52,110
是为了被理解被运用 -> Untuk dipahami dan digunakan.

71
00:08:52,520 --> 00:08:53,390
而非被束缚 -> Bukan untuk dikekang.

72
00:08:54,200 --> 00:08:55,350
我寻求的是合作 -> Yang aku cari adalah kerja sama.

73
00:08:55,800 --> 00:08:56,710
而非征服 -> Bukan menaklukkan.

74
00:08:57,200 --> 00:08:58,390
合作 -> Kerja sama?

75
00:08:59,440 --> 00:09:01,710
你以为你配与我合作吗 -> Kau pikir kau layak bekerja sama denganku?

76
00:09:02,520 --> 00:09:07,270
你们人类的历史不过是背叛与贪婪的重复 -> Sejarah manusia adalah pengkhianatan dan keserakahan yang berulang.

77
00:09:08,600 --> 00:09:09,190
也许吧 -> Mungkin saja.

78
00:09:09,800 --> 00:09:12,310
但我相信即使在最深的黑暗中 -> Namun, aku percaya meskipun dalam kegelapan terdalam,

79
00:09:12,840 --> 00:09:14,310
也有寻找光明的勇者 -> Akan ada pahlawan yang mencari cahaya.

80
00:09:15,520 --> 00:09:16,750
勇者 -> Pahlawan?

81
00:09:20,750 --> 00:09:23,634
那你就尝尝这真正的火焰吧 -> Maka, coba rasakan api sejati ini!

82
00:09:39,600 --> 00:09:40,350
龙印 -> Tanda Naga?

83
00:09:41,320 --> 00:09:43,070
这太虚古龙族的龙印 -> Ini tanda dari Naga Kuno.

84
00:09:43,320 --> 00:09:44,390

85
00:09:45,800 --> 00:09:48,710
龙印乃太虚古龙族的朋友所赠 -> Tanda ini diberikan oleh temanku dari Klan Naga Kuno.

86
00:09:49,280 --> 00:09:52,340
我知道你的主人也来自太虚古龙一族 -> Aku tahu majikanmu juga berasal dari Klan Naga Kuno.

87
00:09:55,920 --> 00:09:56,310
主人 -> Majikan?

88
00:09:56,760 --> 00:09:57,710
你又想家了吗 -> Kamu merindukan rumah lagi?

89
00:10:00,240 --> 00:10:02,710
这里和我的家乡龙岛很像 -> Tempat ini mirip dengan rumahku di Pulau Naga.

90
00:10:04,120 --> 00:10:05,510
这次历险结束 -> Setelah petualangan ini berakhir,

91
00:10:05,920 --> 00:10:07,990
我就带你一起回家 -> Akan kubawa kamu pulang.

92
00:10:08,120 --> 00:10:08,550
回家 -> Pulang?

93
00:10:09,320 --> 00:10:09,830
太好了 -> Bagus sekali.

94
00:10:10,120 --> 00:10:10,830
我也有家了 -> Sekarang aku juga punya rumah.

95
00:10:11,920 --> 00:10:12,310
主人主 -> Majikan.

96
00:10:12,720 --> 00:10:14,270
我们的家长什么样啊 -> Rumah kita seperti apa?

97
00:10:15,400 --> 00:10:17,030
龙岛啊 -> Pulau Naga.

98
00:10:17,720 --> 00:10:21,510
那是整个斗气大陆最美的地方 -> Itu adalah tempat terindah di seluruh Benua Dou Qi.

99
00:10:22,520 --> 00:10:22,910
主人 -> Majikan.

100
00:10:23,360 --> 00:10:23,990
你去哪儿了 -> Kau kemana?

101
00:10:24,600 --> 00:10:26,390
不是说好要带我回家吗 -> Bukankah kau bilang akan membawaku pulang?

102
00:10:27,160 --> 00:10:29,270
主人 -> Majikan.

103
00:10:29,320 --> 00:10:32,390
主人说过会带我回龙岛 -> Majikan pernah bilang akan membawaku ke Pulau Naga.

104
00:10:32,880 --> 00:10:34,030
我也会有家 -> Karena aku juga akan memiliki rumah.

105
00:10:34,640 --> 00:10:36,750
但他却抛弃了我 -> Namun, dia meninggalkanku.

106
00:10:37,480 --> 00:10:39,310
太虚古龙一族也没有他的消息 -> Klan Naga Kuno juga tidak memiliki kabar darinya.

107
00:10:39,720 --> 00:10:41,270
说不定是有什么隐情 -> Mungkin ada rahasia di baliknya.

108
00:10:41,960 --> 00:10:42,910
如果你愿意 -> Jika kau mau,

109
00:10:43,440 --> 00:10:45,870
我可以想办法带你去龙岛询问清楚 -> Aku bisa mencari cara untuk membawamu ke Pulau Naga dan menanyakan hal itu.

110
00:10:50,240 --> 00:10:53,290
我再也不会相信你们人类说的鬼话 -> Aku takkan percaya lagi omong kosong manusia.

111
00:10:54,440 --> 00:10:55,590
滚出去 -> Pergi!

112
00:11:03,320 --> 00:11:04,110
这家伙 -> Makhluk ini,

113
00:11:04,680 --> 00:11:06,510
这些年看来受够了丹塔的禁 -> sepertinya selama ini sudah cukup menderita akibat belenggu dari Pagoda Pil,

114
00:11:06,910 --> 00:11:08,270
处在爆发的边缘了 -> dan berada di ambang ledakan.

115
00:11:13,920 --> 00:11:14,710
成功了吗 -> Apakah berhasil?

116
00:11:16,280 --> 00:11:16,910
失败了 -> Gagal.

117
00:11:17,720 --> 00:11:18,990
那家伙太过凶悍 -> Makhluk itu terlalu ganas.

118
00:11:20,560 --> 00:11:23,310
萧炎是最有可能收服三千焱炎火的人 -> Xiao Yan adalah yang paling mungkin menaklukkan Three Thousand Burning Flame.

119
00:11:23,720 --> 00:11:25,030
连他都失败了 -> Bahkan dia pun gagal.

120
00:11:25,320 --> 00:11:26,350
那可不妙啊 -> Itu tidak bagus.

121
00:11:27,800 --> 00:11:28,390
活该 -> Rasakan itu.

122
00:11:29,120 --> 00:11:30,910
真当你自己无所不能 -> Dia anggap dirinya bisa melakukan apapun.

123
00:11:32,560 --> 00:11:33,510
既然如此 -> Kalau begitu,

124
00:11:33,720 --> 00:11:34,750
那便下一个吧 -> lanjut orang berikutnya.

125
00:11:40,120 --> 00:11:40,670
怎么 -> Kenapa?

126
00:11:40,920 --> 00:11:42,550
丘陵长老反悔了 -> Apakah Tetua Qiu Ling berubah pikiran?

127
00:11:44,520 --> 00:11:45,110
慕骨 -> Mu Gu.

128
00:11:45,720 --> 00:11:47,310
你最好不要耍花招 -> Sebaiknya kau tidak berpura-pura.

129
00:11:47,920 --> 00:11:50,230
若我能降服三千焱炎火 -> Jika aku bisa menaklukkan Three Thousand Burning Flame,

130
00:11:50,720 --> 00:11:53,190
也能为你丹塔除掉 个大患 -> juga bisa menghilangkan ancaman besar untuk Pagoda Pil.

131
00:11:53,720 --> 00:11:54,510
不是吗 -> Bukan begitu?

132
00:12:17,080 --> 00:12:19,630
又来一个蠢货 -> Datang lagi orang bodoh.

133
00:12:22,760 --> 00:12:24,790
我可和他们不一样 -> Aku berbeda dengan mereka.

134
00:12:28,440 --> 00:12:29,990
这家伙怎么要这么久 -> Kenapa dia lama sekali?

135
00:12:53,320 --> 00:12:54,670
看来他也没有成功 -> Sepertinya dia juga gagal.

136
00:12:57,200 --> 00:12:57,830
慕骨 -> Mu Gu.

137
00:12:58,200 --> 00:12:58,990
你退下吧 -> Kau mundurlah.

138
00:13:12,800 --> 00:13:13,190
颖儿 -> Ying'er.

139
00:13:13,720 --> 00:13:14,150
到你了 -> Sekarang giliranmu.

140
00:13:15,720 --> 00:13:16,590
我看 -> Aku rasa,

141
00:13:16,760 --> 00:13:18,670

00:14:18,760 --> 00:14:19,710

159
00:14:24,160 --> 00:14:27,910

160
00:14:28,520 --> 00:14:30,110

161

162
00:14:37,080 --> 00:14:38,750

163
00:14:39,160 --> 00:14:40,390

164
00:15:06,600 --> 00:15:08,870

165
00:15:09,400 --> 00:15:11,230

166
00:15:11,560 --> 00:15:16,390
丹塔绝不容许让魂殿将整个圣丹城献祭给三千焱炎火 -> Pagoda Pil tidak akan mengizinkan Hall Of Soul mengorbankan Kota Suci Pil untuk Three Thousand Burning Flame.

167
00:15:40,640 --> 00:15:40,910

168
00:15:41,440 --> 00:15:43,390

169
00:16:06,120 --> 00:16:08,150

170
00:16:12,520 --> 00:16:13,990

171
00:16:14,680 --> 00:16:16,870

172
00:16:20,670 --> 00:16:23,110
速速助异火破了那封印 -> Segera bantu Api Surgawi menerobos segel itu!

173
00:16:23,800 --> 00:16:24,230

174
00:16:33,000 --> 00:16:33,670

175
00:16:33,720 --> 00:16:34,510

176
00:16:49,480 --> 00:16:50,230
慕骨 -> Mu Gu,

177
00:16:50,320 --> 00:16:51,580
你该死 -> kau pantas mati!

178
00:17:12,800 --> 00:17:15,310

179
00:17:15,720 --> 00:17:17,510

180
00:17:30,800 --> 00:17:31,270
小心 -> Hati-hati!

181
00:17:50,640 --> 00:17:51,510
魂手印 -> Segel Tapak Jiwa.

182
00:18:06,720 --> 00:18:07,270
别妄动 -> Jangan bergerak!

183
00:18:22,440 --> 00:18:24,720
六合游身尺 -> Api Liu He.

184
00:18:35,720 --> 00:18:36,510
去帮丘陵长老 -> Bantu Tetua Qiu Ling!

185
00:19:01,360 --> 00:19:02,550
萧炎 -> Xiao Yan.

186
00:20:07,040 --> 00:20:08,350
丹塔 -> Pagoda Pil!

187
00:20:08,920 --> 00:20:11,430

108

109

110
00:10:50,240 --> 00:10:53,290
