00:05:31,160 --> 00:05:32,079
why don't you save him

37
00:05:32,720 --> 00:05:33,839
It’s not that we don’t want to save ourselves.

38
00:05:34,840 --> 00:05:35,599
Rather

39
00:05:57,240 --> 00:05:58,639
That's how it is

40
00:05:58,880 --> 00:06:00,559
It’s really a helpless move

41
00:06:01,640 --> 00:06:03,399
Then I will go to the Star Territory myself to bring Xiao Yan back

42
00:06:03,960 --> 00:06:04,719
Don't be impulsive

43
00:06:05,480 --> 00:06:05,999
get out of the way

44
00:06:09,480 --> 00:06:11,479
The state of the star field is extremely unstable

45
00:06:12,000 --> 00:06:14,039
The situation of Sanqian Yanyanhuo is also unclear.

46
00:06:14,640 --> 00:06:16,519
It's definitely not something you can contend with on your own.

47
00:06:17,560 --> 00:06:19,959
And if you intrude by force at this time,

48
00:06:20,400 --> 00:06:22,439
It will only make the lives of Shengdan City miserable.

49
00:06:22,440 --> 00:06:23,039
get out of my way

50
00:06:25,040 --> 00:06:26,159
I can't control that much

51
00:06:27,200 --> 00:06:28,639
Sister, little medical fairy, don’t worry.

52
00:06:29,480 --> 00:06:31,039
From what I sensed

53
00:06:31,520 --> 00:06:33,239
Xiao Yan is not in danger now

54
00:06:33,720 --> 00:06:35,559
Not only has the current dragon seal not disappeared,

55
00:06:35,960 --> 00:06:37,199
And it exudes golden light

56
00:06:37,560 --> 00:06:39,079
It means his condition is pretty good.

57
00:06:40,480 --> 00:06:44,359
Perhaps now is the critical moment for Xiao Yan to conquer Three Thousand Yan Yanhuo

58
00:06:45,160 --> 00:06:46,119
We went in rashly

59
00:06:46,360 --> 00:06:47,359
It will disturb him instead

60
00:06:48,120 --> 00:06:48,559
rest assured

61
00:06:49,000 --> 00:06:50,159
once the time is right

62
00:06:50,560 --> 00:06:53,119
I will immediately enter it and bring Xiao Yan out

63
00:06:56,160 --> 00:06:57,639
If Xiao Yan's condition changes

64
00:06:58,400 --> 00:07:01,079
Even if I risk my life, I will break into the star field

65
00:07:23,960 --> 00:07:25,879
Are you going to hide in there?

66
00:07:26,120 --> 00:07:28,159
Are you going to be a coward for the rest of your life?

67
00:07:59,880 --> 00:08:01,559
Go to hell

68
00:08:01,640 --> 00:08:01,959
Too bad

69
00:08:18,920 --> 00:08:21,279
Let's see how long you can hold on

70
00:08:38,720 --> 00:08:40,719
This is the power of dragon seal

71
00:08:40,760 --> 00:08:42,199
how so

72
00:09:19,440 --> 00:09:21,279
The Origin Fire of Three Thousand Flames

73
00:09:21,760 --> 00:09:22,799
seems to be attacking

74
00:09:23,120 --> 00:09:26,359
In fact, the power is transferred into my body through this dragon seal.

75
00:09:26,840 --> 00:09:28,359
And the impact the body received

76
00:09:28,680 --> 00:09:29,999
It will also be repaired

77
00:09:44,000 --> 00:09:46,039
My energy is actually shrinking

78
00:09:47,000 --> 00:09:48,079
despicable humans

79
00:09:48,760 --> 00:09:51,159
Do you dare to come out and fight me to the death?

80
00:09:59,600 --> 00:10:00,839
The energy is almost absorbed

81
00:10:02,760 --> 00:10:03,599
So now

82
00:10:04,360 --> 00:10:05,199
it's my turn

83
00:10:10,040 --> 00:10:11,239
Damn it

84
00:10:23,760 --> 00:10:24,240
Heavenly Demon Puppet

85
00:11:01,720 --> 00:11:03,319
Let's die together

86
00:11:03,680 --> 00:11:05,599
Damn humans

87
00:11:15,480 --> 00:11:16,679
Will we die together?

88
00:11:17,120 --> 00:11:19,559
You are not qualified to say this at this moment

89
00:11:27,640 --> 00:11:30,119
Just accept your fate of being subdued

90
00:12:30,000 --> 00:12:30,559
Don't worry

91
00:12:31,080 --> 00:12:31,559
follow me

92
00:12:32,080 --> 00:12:33,959
I won’t disgrace your name on this strange fire list.

93
00:12:34,760 --> 00:12:35,479
Have a chance

94
00:12:35,800 --> 00:12:37,079
I will definitely take you to Long Island

95
00:12:37,360 --> 00:12:38,799
Find your previous master

96
00:12:39,320 --> 00:12:40,279
fulfill your wish

97
00:14:18,160 --> 00:14:19,639
Three Thousand Flames of Fire

98
00:14:20,440 --> 00:14:22,319
It is indeed the ninth ranked alien fire.

99
00:15:09,600 --> 00:15:11,239
Successfully promoted to Nine Star Douzong

100
00:15:11,880 --> 00:15:13,719
Burning Jue is exactly what the teacher said

101
00:15:14,200 --> 00:15:16,519
It is a miraculous skill that is one of the best in the world.

102
00:15:30,760 --> 00:15:32,919
This new flame combines three different fires

103
00:15:33,520 --> 00:15:33,999
Not as good as

104
00:15:34,600 --> 00:15:36,159
Just call it Three Thousand Lotus Heart Fires

105
00:15:44,360 --> 00:15:45,639
The demon puppet is also much stronger

106
00:15:46,120 --> 00:15:47,799
Could it be because he was tempered by this sea of ​​fire?

107
00:15:49,400 --> 00:15:50,159
That being the case

108
00:15:50,600 --> 00:15:51,359
before going out

109
00:15:51,600 --> 00:15:52,759
Just let me make the most of it

110
00:15:54,360 --> 00:15:54,679
condense

111
00:16:21,880 --> 00:16:22,959
what is going on

112
00:16:23,400 --> 00:16:24,639
Is it the end of the world?

113
00:16:24,840 --> 00:16:25,719
Shengdan City is going to be destroyed

114
00:16:26,000 --> 00:16:27,079
Everyone, run quickly

115
00:16:32,240 --> 00:16:34,359
Those below Dou Huang will retreat immediately

116
00:16:35,000 --> 00:16:35,839
The rest of the strong

117
00:16:36,160 --> 00:16:37,919
Prepare to form a formation to protect Shengdan City

118
00:16:55,520 --> 00:16:58,399
We must not let Star Territory destroy Dan Pagoda and the entire Holy Dan City.

119
00:17:10,440 --> 00:17:10,959
Xiao Yan

120
00:17:11,600 --> 00:17:12,439
Can you still come out?

121
00:17:18,040 --> 00:17:19,199
What happened in the Star Territory?

122
00:17:20,680 --> 00:17:21,719
You guys should leave Danta as soon as possible

123
00:17:22,080 --> 00:17:23,319
The star field will collapse at any time

124
00:17:24,000 --> 00:17:24,359
What

125
00:17:24,760 --> 00:17:25,319
Then Xiao Yan

126
00:17:29,960 --> 00:17:30,319
Zi Yan

127
00:17:30,720 --> 00:17:32,119
Please help me open a space channel

128
00:17:32,520 --> 00:17:33,359
I want to go in and save Xiao Yan

129
00:17:46,720 --> 00:17:48,399
If you go in now, you will die.

130
00:17:48,600 --> 00:17:49,159
Go quickly

131
00:17:50,240 --> 00:17:51,119
You're going to die

132
00:17:51,880 --> 00:17:54,999
I want to go in with the Little Medical Fairy Sister to bring Xiao Yan out.

133
00:17:57,800 --> 00:17:58,879
Such an interesting thing

134
00:17:59,080 --> 00:18:00,359
Of course, I’m also indispensable

135
00:18:10,800 --> 00:18:11,639
Latecomers make up for it

136
00:18:26,280 --> 00:18:26,559
not good

137
00:18:27,640 --> 00:18:28,199
Go quickly

/ms terjemahkan ke inggris yang baik dan tidak terlalu formal:
Dialogue: 0,0:00:00.00,0:00:10.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Join channel t.me/dongworld agar tidak ketinggalan update. \NDonghua ini diterjemahkan oleh DongWorld.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:28.88,0:00:29.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:30.08,0:00:31.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Beraninya kau membunuhku.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:31.84,0:00:33.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Negara Vermillion pasti akan menghancurkanmu berkeping-keping.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:34.72,0:00:35.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ancaman semacam ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:36.00,0:00:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak tampak seperti keluar dari mulut seorang putri yang memiliki harga diri tinggi.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:39.52,0:00:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:41.36,0:00:43.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bukankah kau ingin bertarung denganku?
Dialogue: 0,0:00:49.44,0:00:50.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di antara serpihan-serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:50.36,0:00:51.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tidak bisa menggunakan Kuali Pemulihan.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:51.72,0:00:52.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika ingin keluar,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:52.92,0:00:54.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya ada satu jalan kembali ke lantai kedua.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:12.32,0:01:13.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap awal Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:14.32,0:01:15.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tidak akan bisa menahanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:16.72,0:01:17.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:29.92,0:01:30.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ini adalah...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:32.76,0:01:33.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...konsepsi waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:35.32,0:01:36.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika tampaknya...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:36.80,0:01:38.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hanya merupakan Konspsi tahap tengah Soul Formation,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:38.44,0:01:39.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku bisa menghancurkannya dengan satu serangan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:40.32,0:01:42.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dia pasti mengira aku sedang terluka parah,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:43.44,0:01:44.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,maka terperangkap dalam keadaan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:48.52,0:01:49.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:54.92,0:01:56.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak bisa lagi menghabiskan waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:06.16,0:02:08.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bisa kembali ke Negara Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:08.75,0:02:11.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak heran gadis ini begitu percaya diri di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:11.84,0:02:13.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku sudah mengingatmu, Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:14.32,0:02:14.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hari ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:15.92,0:02:17.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau memaksaku untuk menurunkan satu tingkat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:17.92,0:02:19.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Membuka gelang berharga ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:20.64,0:02:21.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Besok,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:22.00,0:02:23.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti akan membuatmu membayar seratus kali lipat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:24.88,0:02:26.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sampai jumpa di bintang Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:26.80,0:02:28.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi tanpa perasaan ternyata sangat kuat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:29.24,0:02:30.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:30.52,0:02:31.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau lihat ini barang apa?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:34.24,0:02:35.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kipas milik kakak senior.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:39.60,0:02:41.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi Hong Die mulai terganggu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:53.04,0:02:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa pergi.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:06.40,0:03:07.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Masih kurang cepat.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:08.52,0:03:10.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Walaupun tidak membunuh gadis ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:10.84,0:03:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tetapi dengan lengan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:12.60,0:03:14.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,ada banyak cara untuk melakukannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:15.72,0:03:16.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dengan demikian,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:17.20,0:03:20.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti dapat membuat kultivasinya terhenti pada tahap Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:26.44,0:03:26.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jalan...
Dialogue: 0,0:03:27.76,0:03:28.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,terputus.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:35.88,0:03:36.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Benar juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:37.92,0:03:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kuali Pemulihan tidak bisa digunakan di antara serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:41.12,0:03:42.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sungguh tiada jalan keluar dari langit.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:52.16,0:03:52.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:54.04,0:03:54.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:57.20,0:03:58.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kembali ke lantai kedua sudah tidak mungkin.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:59.20,0:04:00.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ingin mempertaruhkan sedikit harapan,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:00.56,0:04:01.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya bisa ke lantai berikutnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:02.96,0:04:03.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:04.20,0:04:05.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,di sini kita berdua memiliki kultivasi terendah.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:06.44,0:04:07.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hanya bisa bekerja sama.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:08.16,0:04:09.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng maksud pergi ke lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:11.12,0:04:13.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di mana pintu masuk lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:28.68,0:04:30.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata Saudara Zeng sudah mempersiapkan segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:30.80,0:04:32.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sesuai yang dikatakan Zhou Yi,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:32.68,0:04:34.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,serpihan di lantai enam saling berhubungan.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:35.56,0:04:37.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bahkan jika kita bersembunyi di lantai keempat,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:38.00,0:04:39.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,runtuh hanya masalah waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:41.52,0:04:44.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Satu-satunya cara untuk menyeberangi ruang dan meninggalkan tempat ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:45.52,0:04:47.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanyalah kompas bintang milik Chi Hu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:53.20,0:04:54.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seluruh istana ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:55.04,0:04:56.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dibuat dari Giok Abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:16.60,0:05:18.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pemilik tempat ini memang sangat kaya.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:22.56,0:05:23.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:23.36,0:05:24.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau gila!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:24.60,0:05:26.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mayat wanita itu sudah kuberikan padamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:26.12,0:05:27.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mengapa kau masih mengganggu?
Dialogue: 0,0:05:31.52,0:05:32.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:32.48,0:05:34.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah membakar jiwa Primordial-mu, itu pasti akan membuatmu mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:35.16,0:05:36.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jangan coba menarikku ke dalam juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:57.44,0:05:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:58.52,0:05:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Telah mengganggu Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:00.40,0:06:01.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktunya kau dihukum.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:04.32,0:06:05.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepala!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:05.72,0:06:06.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepalaku sangat sakit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:18.56,0:06:19.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:19.92,0:06:21.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bunuh dia!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:22.16,0:06:24.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akan kuikuti untuk bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:50.52,0:06:51.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pertarungan yang sulit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:52.08,0:06:53.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jiwa Primordial akan segera habis.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:53.80,0:06:56.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku hanya perlu bertahan sebentar lagi,
Dialogue: 0,0:06:56.48,0:06:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau pasti akan hancur.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:58.52,0:06:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa memusnahkanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:02.52,0:07:03.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:03.88,0:07:07.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu yang menghancurkan ingatanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:17.04,0:07:18.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Energi semakin melemah.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:19.52,0:07:20.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Takkan bertahan lama lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:37.32,0:07:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku menang!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:39.12,0:07:39.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:40.56,0:07:43.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dulu kau adalah jenius di Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:43.72,0:07:45.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kini demi mayat wanita ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:46.28,0:07:48.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau berakhir dengan nasib malang.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:51.20,0:07:54.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah mencari seumur hidup ini namun tak mendapati.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:54.84,0:07:56.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di ujung kehidupan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:57.20,0:07:59.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dengan membakar jiwa Primordial,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:59.60,0:08:00.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,akhirnya mengerti.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:11.04,0:08:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:13.16,0:08:14.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...akan datang!
Dialogue: 0,0:08:39.40,0:08:40.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Apa sebenarnya ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:41.52,0:08:42.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kekuatan apa ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:43.60,0:08:44.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:45.76,0:08:47.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...ini adalah Dao.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:48.16,0:08:50.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru pernah berkata, yang mendengar Dao...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:50.28,0:08:51.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hidup dan mati di antara pagi dan malam.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:53.20,0:08:55.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata inilah maknanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:14.00,0:09:17.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Zhou Yi | Tahap Ascendan
Dialogue: 0,0:09:24.16,0:09:25.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap Ascendan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:26.16,0:09:27.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:27.72,0:09:31.36,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akhirnya aku mengingatnya, mengingat segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:33.36,0:09:35.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sejak kecil aku memiliki bakat luar biasa.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:35.72,0:09:38.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seribu tahun lalu, aku berguru di bawah bimbingan Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:39.60,0:09:41.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Semua orang berharap aku membanggakan sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:42.16,0:09:44.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Menjadi sosok besar di dunia kultivasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:46.60,0:09:47.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saat Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:49.08,0:09:51.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru memberikanku Kuali.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:51.40,0:09:54.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Memungkinkan aku mencari kesempatan di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:55.76,0:09:56.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di dunia abadi,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:57.96,0:09:59.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku justru bertemu denganmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:01.00,0:10:03.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku kira ketertarikan ini karena aku mencintaimu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:05.12,0:10:07.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi kini aku akhirnya tahu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:07.92,0:10:10.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ketertarikan ini adalah yang kau paksa padaku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:11.08,0:10:13.77,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau memaksaku mengumpulkan Giok Abadi untuk melindungi tubuhmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:14.72,0:10:16.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Untuk menjaga tubuh abadi-mu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:16.68,0:10:18.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku mencuri Giok Abadi dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:20.08,0:10:22.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru sangat marah dan mengusirku dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:23.32,0:10:24.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hingga saat guru gagal dalam pertarungan,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:24.88,0:10:27.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku tidak sempat bertemu lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:28.96,0:10:30.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Budi baik guru,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:31.04,0:10:32.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak bisa terbalaskan.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:34.36,0:10:37.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku diam-diam bertindak untuk menyelamatkan Sekte Lima Elemen dari tiga bencana besar.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:38.40,0:10:39.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Agar hatiku tenang.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:42.12,0:10:43.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak ada tempat bagiku di dunia ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:44.16,0:10:46.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku pergi mengembara bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:47.00,0:10:50.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Baik penjahat besar maupun yang orang tak berguna,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:52.40,0:10:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,semua mengejekku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:56.40,0:10:58.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dari penuh semangat dan percaya diri,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:58.80,0:11:01.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,menjadi bahan tertawaan di mata orang-orang.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:03.08,0:11:04.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pengertianku adalah cinta.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:05.32,0:11:07.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hati Dao-ku adalah kamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:08.16,0:11:10.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dalam urusan dunia, mana ada yang bisa memuaskan semua pihak?
Dialogue: 0,0:11:10.96,0:11:13.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seumur hidupku, Zhou Yi telah menyakiti terlalu banyak orang.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:14.56,0:11:15.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi satu-satunya yang tak ingin,..
Dialogue: 0,0:11:17.16,0:11:19.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...dan tidak akan aku sakiti adalah kamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:20.84,0:11:22.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Meskipun harus mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:22.76,0:11:24.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku rela melakukannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:26.24,0:11:27.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika masih ada reinkarnasi,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:29.40,0:11:31.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku akan memilih,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:31.96,0:11:33.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,untuk bertemu denganmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:41.96,0:11:42.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara muda.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:44.00,0:11:45.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Setelah aku mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:45.76,0:11:47.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tolong jaga istriku.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:47.92,0:11:48.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mau?
Dialogue: 0,0:11:51.28,0:11:53.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi sangat terkenal di Bintang Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:54.28,0:11:55.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mayat wanita ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:55.56,0:11:56.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,pasti juga tidak sederhana.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:57.92,0:12:00.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika berita tentang mayat wanita ini tersebar,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:01.04,0:12:03.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku khawatir tidak akan ada kesempatan lagi untuk mewarisi posisi ketua klan.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:04.16,0:12:05.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi jika aku menolaknya,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:06.76,0:12:07.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku khawatir...

terjemahkan ke inggris yang baik dan tidak terlalu formal:
Dialogue: 0,0:00:00.00,0:00:10.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Join channel t.me/dongworld agar tidak ketinggalan update. \NDonghua ini diterjemahkan oleh DongWorld.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:28.88,0:00:29.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:30.08,0:00:31.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Beraninya kau membunuhku.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:31.84,0:00:33.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Negara Vermillion pasti akan menghancurkanmu berkeping-keping.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:34.72,0:00:35.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ancaman semacam ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:36.00,0:00:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak tampak seperti keluar dari mulut seorang putri yang memiliki harga diri tinggi.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:39.52,0:00:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:41.36,0:00:43.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bukankah kau ingin bertarung denganku?
Dialogue: 0,0:00:49.44,0:00:50.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di antara serpihan-serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:50.36,0:00:51.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tidak bisa menggunakan Kuali Pemulihan.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:51.72,0:00:52.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika ingin keluar,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:52.92,0:00:54.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya ada satu jalan kembali ke lantai kedua.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:12.32,0:01:13.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap awal Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:14.32,0:01:15.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tidak akan bisa menahanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:16.72,0:01:17.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:29.92,0:01:30.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ini adalah...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:32.76,0:01:33.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...konsepsi waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:35.32,0:01:36.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika tampaknya...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:36.80,0:01:38.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hanya merupakan Konspsi tahap tengah Soul Formation,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:38.44,0:01:39.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku bisa menghancurkannya dengan satu serangan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:40.32,0:01:42.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dia pasti mengira aku sedang terluka parah,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:43.44,0:01:44.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,maka terperangkap dalam keadaan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:48.52,0:01:49.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:54.92,0:01:56.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak bisa lagi menghabiskan waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:06.16,0:02:08.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bisa kembali ke Negara Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:08.75,0:02:11.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak heran gadis ini begitu percaya diri di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:11.84,0:02:13.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku sudah mengingatmu, Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:14.32,0:02:14.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hari ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:15.92,0:02:17.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau memaksaku untuk menurunkan satu tingkat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:17.92,0:02:19.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Membuka gelang berharga ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:20.64,0:02:21.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Besok,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:22.00,0:02:23.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti akan membuatmu membayar seratus kali lipat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:24.88,0:02:26.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sampai jumpa di bintang Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:26.80,0:02:28.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi tanpa perasaan ternyata sangat kuat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:29.24,0:02:30.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:30.52,0:02:31.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau lihat ini barang apa?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:34.24,0:02:35.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kipas milik kakak senior.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:39.60,0:02:41.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi Hong Die mulai terganggu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:53.04,0:02:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa pergi.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:06.40,0:03:07.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Masih kurang cepat.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:08.52,0:03:10.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Walaupun tidak membunuh gadis ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:10.84,0:03:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tetapi dengan lengan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:12.60,0:03:14.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,ada banyak cara untuk melakukannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:15.72,0:03:16.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dengan demikian,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:17.20,0:03:20.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti dapat membuat kultivasinya terhenti pada tahap Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:26.44,0:03:26.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jalan...
Dialogue: 0,0:03:27.76,0:03:28.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,terputus.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:35.88,0:03:36.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Benar juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:37.92,0:03:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kuali Pemulihan tidak bisa digunakan di antara serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:41.12,0:03:42.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sungguh tiada jalan keluar dari langit.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:52.16,0:03:52.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:54.04,0:03:54.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:57.20,0:03:58.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kembali ke lantai kedua sudah tidak mungkin.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:59.20,0:04:00.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ingin mempertaruhkan sedikit harapan,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:00.56,0:04:01.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya bisa ke lantai berikutnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:02.96,0:04:03.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:04.20,0:04:05.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,di sini kita berdua memiliki kultivasi terendah.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:06.44,0:04:07.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hanya bisa bekerja sama.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:08.16,0:04:09.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng maksud pergi ke lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:11.12,0:04:13.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di mana pintu masuk lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:28.68,0:04:30.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata Saudara Zeng sudah mempersiapkan segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:30.80,0:04:32.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sesuai yang dikatakan Zhou Yi,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:32.68,0:04:34.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,serpihan di lantai enam saling berhubungan.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:35.56,0:04:37.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bahkan jika kita bersembunyi di lantai keempat,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:38.00,0:04:39.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,runtuh hanya masalah waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:41.52,0:04:44.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Satu-satunya cara untuk menyeberangi ruang dan meninggalkan tempat ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:45.52,0:04:47.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanyalah kompas bintang milik Chi Hu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:53.20,0:04:54.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seluruh istana ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:55.04,0:04:56.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dibuat dari Giok Abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:16.60,0:05:18.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pemilik tempat ini memang sangat kaya.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:22.56,0:05:23.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:23.36,0:05:24.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau gila!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:24.60,0:05:26.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mayat wanita itu sudah kuberikan padamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:26.12,0:05:27.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mengapa kau masih mengganggu?
Dialogue: 0,0:05:31.52,0:05:32.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:32.48,0:05:34.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah membakar jiwa Primordial-mu, itu pasti akan membuatmu mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:35.16,0:05:36.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jangan coba menarikku ke dalam juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:57.44,0:05:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:58.52,0:05:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Telah mengganggu Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:00.40,0:06:01.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktunya kau dihukum.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:04.32,0:06:05.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepala!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:05.72,0:06:06.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepalaku sangat sakit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:18.56,0:06:19.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:19.92,0:06:21.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bunuh dia!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:22.16,0:06:24.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akan kuikuti untuk bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:50.52,0:06:51.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pertarungan yang sulit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:52.08,0:06:53.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jiwa Primordial akan segera habis.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:53.80,0:06:56.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku hanya perlu bertahan sebentar lagi,
Dialogue: 0,0:06:56.48,0:06:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau pasti akan hancur.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:58.52,0:06:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa memusnahkanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:02.52,0:07:03.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:03.88,0:07:07.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu yang menghancurkan ingatanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:17.04,0:07:18.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Energi semakin melemah.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:19.52,0:07:20.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Takkan bertahan lama lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:37.32,0:07:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku menang!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:39.12,0:07:39.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:40.56,0:07:43.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dulu kau adalah jenius di Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:43.72,0:07:45.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kini demi mayat wanita ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:46.28,0:07:48.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau berakhir dengan nasib malang.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:51.20,0:07:54.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah mencari seumur hidup ini namun tak mendapati.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:54.84,0:07:56.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di ujung kehidupan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:57.20,0:07:59.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dengan membakar jiwa Primordial,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:59.60,0:08:00.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,akhirnya mengerti.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:11.04,0:08:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:13.16,0:08:14.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...akan datang!
Dialogue: 0,0:08:39.40,0:08:40.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Apa sebenarnya ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:41.52,0:08:42.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kekuatan apa ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:43.60,0:08:44.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:45.76,0:08:47.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...ini adalah Dao.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:48.16,0:08:50.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru pernah berkata, yang mendengar Dao...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:50.28,0:08:51.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hidup dan mati di antara pagi dan malam.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:53.20,0:08:55.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata inilah maknanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:14.00,0:09:17.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Zhou Yi | Tahap Ascendan
Dialogue: 0,0:09:24.16,0:09:25.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap Ascendan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:26.16,0:09:27.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:27.72,0:09:31.36,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akhirnya aku mengingatnya, mengingat segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:33.36,0:09:35.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sejak kecil aku memiliki bakat luar biasa.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:35.72,0:09:38.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seribu tahun lalu, aku berguru di bawah bimbingan Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:39.60,0:09:41.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Semua orang berharap aku membanggakan sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:42.16,0:09:44.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Menjadi sosok besar di dunia kultivasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:46.60,0:09:47.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saat Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:49.08,0:09:51.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru memberikanku Kuali.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:51.40,0:09:54.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Memungkinkan aku mencari kesempatan di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:55.76,0:09:56.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di dunia abadi,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:57.96,0:09:59.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku justru bertemu denganmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:01.00,0:10:03.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku kira ketertarikan ini karena aku mencintaimu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:05.12,0:10:07.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi kini aku akhirnya tahu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:07.92,0:10:10.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ketertarikan ini adalah yang kau paksa padaku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:11.08,0:10:13.77,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau memaksaku mengumpulkan Giok Abadi untuk melindungi tubuhmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:14.72,0:10:16.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Untuk menjaga tubuh abadi-mu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:16.68,0:10:18.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku mencuri Giok Abadi dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:20.08,0:10:22.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru sangat marah dan mengusirku dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:23.32,0:10:24.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hingga saat guru gagal dalam pertarungan,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:24.88,0:10:27.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku tidak sempat bertemu lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:28.96,0:10:30.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Budi baik guru,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:31.04,0:10:32.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak bisa terbalaskan.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:34.36,0:10:37.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku diam-diam bertindak untuk menyelamatkan Sekte Lima Elemen dari tiga bencana besar.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:38.40,0:10:39.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Agar hatiku tenang.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:42.12,0:10:43.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak ada tempat bagiku di dunia ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:44.16,0:10:46.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku pergi mengembara bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:47.00,0:10:50.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Baik penjahat besar maupun yang orang tak berguna,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:52.40,0:10:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,semua mengejekku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:56.40,0:10:58.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dari penuh semangat dan percaya diri,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:58.80,0:11:01.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,menjadi bahan tertawaan di mata orang-orang.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:03.08,0:11:04.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pengertianku adalah cinta.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:05.32,0:11:07.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hati Dao-ku adalah kamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:08.16,0:11:10.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dalam urusan dunia, mana ada yang bisa memuaskan semua pihak?
Dialogue: 0,0:11:10.96,0:11:13.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seumur hidupku, Zhou Yi telah menyakiti terlalu banyak orang.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:14.56,0:11:15.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi satu-satunya yang tak ingin,..
Dialogue: 0,0:11:17.16,0:11:19.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...dan tidak akan aku sakiti adalah kamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:20.84,0:11:22.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Meskipun harus mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:22.76,0:11:24.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku rela melakukannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:26.24,0:11:27.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika masih ada reinkarnasi,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:29.40,0:11:31.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku akan memilih,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:31.96,0:11:33.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,untuk bertemu denganmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:41.96,0:11:42.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara muda.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:44.00,0:11:45.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Setelah aku mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:45.76,0:11:47.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tolong jaga istriku.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:47.92,0:11:48.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mau?
Dialogue: 0,0:11:51.28,0:11:53.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi sangat terkenal di Bintang Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:54.28,0:11:55.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mayat wanita ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:55.56,0:11:56.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,pasti juga tidak sederhana.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:57.92,0:12:00.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika berita tentang mayat wanita ini tersebar,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:01.04,0:12:03.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku khawatir tidak akan ada kesempatan lagi untuk mewarisi posisi ketua klan.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:04.16,0:12:05.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi jika aku menolaknya,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:06.76,0:12:07.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku khawatir...

/ms terjemahkan ke inggris yang baik dan tidak terlalu formal:
Dialogue: 0,0:00:00.00,0:00:10.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Join channel t.me/dongworld agar tidak ketinggalan update. \NDonghua ini diterjemahkan oleh DongWorld.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:28.88,0:00:29.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:30.08,0:00:31.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Beraninya kau membunuhku.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:31.84,0:00:33.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Negara Vermillion pasti akan menghancurkanmu berkeping-keping.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:34.72,0:00:35.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ancaman semacam ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:36.00,0:00:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak tampak seperti keluar dari mulut seorang putri yang memiliki harga diri tinggi.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:39.52,0:00:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:41.36,0:00:43.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bukankah kau ingin bertarung denganku?
Dialogue: 0,0:00:49.44,0:00:50.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di antara serpihan-serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:50.36,0:00:51.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tidak bisa menggunakan Kuali Pemulihan.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:51.72,0:00:52.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika ingin keluar,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:52.92,0:00:54.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya ada satu jalan kembali ke lantai kedua.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:12.32,0:01:13.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap awal Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:14.32,0:01:15.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tidak akan bisa menahanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:16.72,0:01:17.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:29.92,0:01:30.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ini adalah...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:32.76,0:01:33.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...konsepsi waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:35.32,0:01:36.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika tampaknya...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:36.80,0:01:38.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hanya merupakan Konspsi tahap tengah Soul Formation,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:38.44,0:01:39.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku bisa menghancurkannya dengan satu serangan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:40.32,0:01:42.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dia pasti mengira aku sedang terluka parah,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:43.44,0:01:44.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,maka terperangkap dalam keadaan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:48.52,0:01:49.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:54.92,0:01:56.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak bisa lagi menghabiskan waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:06.16,0:02:08.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bisa kembali ke Negara Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:08.75,0:02:11.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak heran gadis ini begitu percaya diri di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:11.84,0:02:13.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku sudah mengingatmu, Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:14.32,0:02:14.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hari ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:15.92,0:02:17.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau memaksaku untuk menurunkan satu tingkat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:17.92,0:02:19.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Membuka gelang berharga ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:20.64,0:02:21.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Besok,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:22.00,0:02:23.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti akan membuatmu membayar seratus kali lipat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:24.88,0:02:26.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sampai jumpa di bintang Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:26.80,0:02:28.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi tanpa perasaan ternyata sangat kuat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:29.24,0:02:30.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:30.52,0:02:31.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau lihat ini barang apa?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:34.24,0:02:35.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kipas milik kakak senior.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:39.60,0:02:41.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi Hong Die mulai terganggu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:53.04,0:02:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa pergi.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:06.40,0:03:07.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Masih kurang cepat.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:08.52,0:03:10.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Walaupun tidak membunuh gadis ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:10.84,0:03:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tetapi dengan lengan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:12.60,0:03:14.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,ada banyak cara untuk melakukannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:15.72,0:03:16.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dengan demikian,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:17.20,0:03:20.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti dapat membuat kultivasinya terhenti pada tahap Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:26.44,0:03:26.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jalan...
Dialogue: 0,0:03:27.76,0:03:28.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,terputus.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:35.88,0:03:36.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Benar juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:37.92,0:03:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kuali Pemulihan tidak bisa digunakan di antara serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:41.12,0:03:42.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sungguh tiada jalan keluar dari langit.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:52.16,0:03:52.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:54.04,0:03:54.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:57.20,0:03:58.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kembali ke lantai kedua sudah tidak mungkin.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:59.20,0:04:00.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ingin mempertaruhkan sedikit harapan,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:00.56,0:04:01.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya bisa ke lantai berikutnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:02.96,0:04:03.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:04.20,0:04:05.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,di sini kita berdua memiliki kultivasi terendah.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:06.44,0:04:07.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hanya bisa bekerja sama.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:08.16,0:04:09.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng maksud pergi ke lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:11.12,0:04:13.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di mana pintu masuk lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:28.68,0:04:30.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata Saudara Zeng sudah mempersiapkan segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:30.80,0:04:32.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sesuai yang dikatakan Zhou Yi,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:32.68,0:04:34.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,serpihan di lantai enam saling berhubungan.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:35.56,0:04:37.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bahkan jika kita bersembunyi di lantai keempat,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:38.00,0:04:39.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,runtuh hanya masalah waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:41.52,0:04:44.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Satu-satunya cara untuk menyeberangi ruang dan meninggalkan tempat ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:45.52,0:04:47.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanyalah kompas bintang milik Chi Hu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:53.20,0:04:54.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seluruh istana ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:55.04,0:04:56.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dibuat dari Giok Abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:16.60,0:05:18.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pemilik tempat ini memang sangat kaya.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:22.56,0:05:23.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:23.36,0:05:24.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau gila!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:24.60,0:05:26.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mayat wanita itu sudah kuberikan padamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:26.12,0:05:27.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mengapa kau masih mengganggu?
Dialogue: 0,0:05:31.52,0:05:32.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:32.48,0:05:34.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah membakar jiwa Primordial-mu, itu pasti akan membuatmu mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:35.16,0:05:36.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jangan coba menarikku ke dalam juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:57.44,0:05:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:58.52,0:05:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Telah mengganggu Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:00.40,0:06:01.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktunya kau dihukum.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:04.32,0:06:05.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepala!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:05.72,0:06:06.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepalaku sangat sakit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:18.56,0:06:19.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:19.92,0:06:21.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bunuh dia!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:22.16,0:06:24.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akan kuikuti untuk bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:50.52,0:06:51.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pertarungan yang sulit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:52.08,0:06:53.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jiwa Primordial akan segera habis.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:53.80,0:06:56.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku hanya perlu bertahan sebentar lagi,
Dialogue: 0,0:06:56.48,0:06:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau pasti akan hancur.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:58.52,0:06:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa memusnahkanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:02.52,0:07:03.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:03.88,0:07:07.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu yang menghancurkan ingatanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:17.04,0:07:18.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Energi semakin melemah.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:19.52,0:07:20.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Takkan bertahan lama lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:37.32,0:07:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku menang!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:39.12,0:07:39.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:40.56,0:07:43.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dulu kau adalah jenius di Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:43.72,0:07:45.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kini demi mayat wanita ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:46.28,0:07:48.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau berakhir dengan nasib malang.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:51.20,0:07:54.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah mencari seumur hidup ini namun tak mendapati.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:54.84,0:07:56.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di ujung kehidupan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:57.20,0:07:59.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dengan membakar jiwa Primordial,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:59.60,0:08:00.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,akhirnya mengerti.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:11.04,0:08:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:13.16,0:08:14.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...akan datang!
Dialogue: 0,0:08:39.40,0:08:40.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Apa sebenarnya ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:41.52,0:08:42.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kekuatan apa ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:43.60,0:08:44.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:45.76,0:08:47.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...ini adalah Dao.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:48.16,0:08:50.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru pernah berkata, yang mendengar Dao...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:50.28,0:08:51.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hidup dan mati di antara pagi dan malam.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:53.20,0:08:55.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata inilah maknanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:14.00,0:09:17.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Zhou Yi | Tahap Ascendan
Dialogue: 0,0:09:24.16,0:09:25.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap Ascendan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:26.16,0:09:27.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:27.72,0:09:31.36,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akhirnya aku mengingatnya, mengingat segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:33.36,0:09:35.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sejak kecil aku memiliki bakat luar biasa.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:35.72,0:09:38.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seribu tahun lalu, aku berguru di bawah bimbingan Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:39.60,0:09:41.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Semua orang berharap aku membanggakan sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:42.16,0:09:44.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Menjadi sosok besar di dunia kultivasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:46.60,0:09:47.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saat Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:49.08,0:09:51.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru memberikanku Kuali.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:51.40,0:09:54.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Memungkinkan aku mencari kesempatan di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:55.76,0:09:56.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di dunia abadi,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:57.96,0:09:59.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku justru bertemu denganmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:01.00,0:10:03.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku kira ketertarikan ini karena aku mencintaimu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:05.12,0:10:07.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi kini aku akhirnya tahu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:07.92,0:10:10.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ketertarikan ini adalah yang kau paksa padaku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:11.08,0:10:13.77,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau memaksaku mengumpulkan Giok Abadi untuk melindungi tubuhmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:14.72,0:10:16.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Untuk menjaga tubuh abadi-mu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:16.68,0:10:18.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku mencuri Giok Abadi dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:20.08,0:10:22.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru sangat marah dan mengusirku dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:23.32,0:10:24.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hingga saat guru gagal dalam pertarungan,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:24.88,0:10:27.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku tidak sempat bertemu lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:28.96,0:10:30.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Budi baik guru,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:31.04,0:10:32.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak bisa terbalaskan.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:34.36,0:10:37.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku diam-diam bertindak untuk menyelamatkan Sekte Lima Elemen dari tiga bencana besar.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:38.40,0:10:39.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Agar hatiku tenang.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:42.12,0:10:43.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak ada tempat bagiku di dunia ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:44.16,0:10:46.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku pergi mengembara bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:47.00,0:10:50.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Baik penjahat besar maupun yang orang tak berguna,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:52.40,0:10:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,semua mengejekku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:56.40,0:10:58.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dari penuh semangat dan percaya diri,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:58.80,0:11:01.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,menjadi bahan tertawaan di mata orang-orang.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:03.08,0:11:04.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pengertianku adalah cinta.

terjemahkan ke inggris yang baik dan tidak terlalu formal:
Dialogue: 0,0:00:00.00,0:00:10.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Join channel t.me/dongworld agar tidak ketinggalan update. \NDonghua ini diterjemahkan oleh DongWorld.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:28.88,0:00:29.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:30.08,0:00:31.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Beraninya kau membunuhku.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:31.84,0:00:33.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Negara Vermillion pasti akan menghancurkanmu berkeping-keping.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:34.72,0:00:35.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ancaman semacam ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:36.00,0:00:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak tampak seperti keluar dari mulut seorang putri yang memiliki harga diri tinggi.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:39.52,0:00:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:41.36,0:00:43.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bukankah kau ingin bertarung denganku?
Dialogue: 0,0:00:49.44,0:00:50.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di antara serpihan-serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:50.36,0:00:51.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tidak bisa menggunakan Kuali Pemulihan.
Dialogue: 0,0:00:51.72,0:00:52.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika ingin keluar,
Dialogue: 0,0:00:52.92,0:00:54.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya ada satu jalan kembali ke lantai kedua.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:12.32,0:01:13.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap awal Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:14.32,0:01:15.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tidak akan bisa menahanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:16.72,0:01:17.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:29.92,0:01:30.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ini adalah...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:32.76,0:01:33.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...konsepsi waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:35.32,0:01:36.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika tampaknya...
Dialogue: 0,0:01:36.80,0:01:38.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hanya merupakan Konspsi tahap tengah Soul Formation,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:38.44,0:01:39.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku bisa menghancurkannya dengan satu serangan.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:40.32,0:01:42.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dia pasti mengira aku sedang terluka parah,
Dialogue: 0,0:01:43.44,0:01:44.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,maka terperangkap dalam keadaan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:48.52,0:01:49.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:01:54.92,0:01:56.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak bisa lagi menghabiskan waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:06.16,0:02:08.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bisa kembali ke Negara Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:08.75,0:02:11.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak heran gadis ini begitu percaya diri di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:11.84,0:02:13.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku sudah mengingatmu, Zeng Niu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:14.32,0:02:14.99,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hari ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:15.92,0:02:17.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau memaksaku untuk menurunkan satu tingkat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:17.92,0:02:19.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Membuka gelang berharga ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:20.64,0:02:21.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Besok,
Dialogue: 0,0:02:22.00,0:02:23.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti akan membuatmu membayar seratus kali lipat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:24.88,0:02:26.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sampai jumpa di bintang Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:26.80,0:02:28.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi tanpa perasaan ternyata sangat kuat.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:29.24,0:02:30.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hong Die.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:30.52,0:02:31.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau lihat ini barang apa?
Dialogue: 0,0:02:34.24,0:02:35.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kipas milik kakak senior.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:39.60,0:02:41.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Konsepsi Hong Die mulai terganggu.
Dialogue: 0,0:02:53.04,0:02:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa pergi.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:06.40,0:03:07.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Masih kurang cepat.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:08.52,0:03:10.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Walaupun tidak membunuh gadis ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:10.84,0:03:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tetapi dengan lengan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:12.60,0:03:14.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,ada banyak cara untuk melakukannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:15.72,0:03:16.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dengan demikian,
Dialogue: 0,0:03:17.20,0:03:20.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku pasti dapat membuat kultivasinya terhenti pada tahap Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:26.44,0:03:26.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jalan...
Dialogue: 0,0:03:27.76,0:03:28.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,terputus.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:35.88,0:03:36.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Benar juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:37.92,0:03:40.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kuali Pemulihan tidak bisa digunakan di antara serpihan ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:41.12,0:03:42.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sungguh tiada jalan keluar dari langit.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:52.16,0:03:52.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:54.04,0:03:54.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng!
Dialogue: 0,0:03:57.20,0:03:58.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kembali ke lantai kedua sudah tidak mungkin.
Dialogue: 0,0:03:59.20,0:04:00.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ingin mempertaruhkan sedikit harapan,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:00.56,0:04:01.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanya bisa ke lantai berikutnya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:02.96,0:04:03.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Chi Hu,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:04.20,0:04:05.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,di sini kita berdua memiliki kultivasi terendah.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:06.44,0:04:07.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hanya bisa bekerja sama.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:08.16,0:04:09.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara Zeng maksud pergi ke lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:11.12,0:04:13.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di mana pintu masuk lantai keempat?
Dialogue: 0,0:04:28.68,0:04:30.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata Saudara Zeng sudah mempersiapkan segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:30.80,0:04:32.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sesuai yang dikatakan Zhou Yi,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:32.68,0:04:34.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,serpihan di lantai enam saling berhubungan.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:35.56,0:04:37.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bahkan jika kita bersembunyi di lantai keempat,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:38.00,0:04:39.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,runtuh hanya masalah waktu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:41.52,0:04:44.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Satu-satunya cara untuk menyeberangi ruang dan meninggalkan tempat ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:45.52,0:04:47.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,hanyalah kompas bintang milik Chi Hu.
Dialogue: 0,0:04:53.20,0:04:54.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seluruh istana ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:04:55.04,0:04:56.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dibuat dari Giok Abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:16.60,0:05:18.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pemilik tempat ini memang sangat kaya.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:22.56,0:05:23.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:23.36,0:05:24.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau gila!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:24.60,0:05:26.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mayat wanita itu sudah kuberikan padamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:26.12,0:05:27.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mengapa kau masih mengganggu?
Dialogue: 0,0:05:31.52,0:05:32.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:05:32.48,0:05:34.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah membakar jiwa Primordial-mu, itu pasti akan membuatmu mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:35.16,0:05:36.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jangan coba menarikku ke dalam juga.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:57.44,0:05:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau.
Dialogue: 0,0:05:58.52,0:05:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Telah mengganggu Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:00.40,0:06:01.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Waktunya kau dihukum.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:04.32,0:06:05.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepala!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:05.72,0:06:06.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kepalaku sangat sakit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:18.56,0:06:19.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:19.92,0:06:21.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bunuh dia!
Dialogue: 0,0:06:22.16,0:06:24.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akan kuikuti untuk bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:50.52,0:06:51.55,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pertarungan yang sulit.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:52.08,0:06:53.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jiwa Primordial akan segera habis.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:53.80,0:06:56.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku hanya perlu bertahan sebentar lagi,
Dialogue: 0,0:06:56.48,0:06:58.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau pasti akan hancur.
Dialogue: 0,0:06:58.52,0:06:59.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau tak bisa memusnahkanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:02.52,0:07:03.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:03.88,0:07:07.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu yang menghancurkan ingatanku.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:17.04,0:07:18.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Energi semakin melemah.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:19.52,0:07:20.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Takkan bertahan lama lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:37.32,0:07:38.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku menang!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:39.12,0:07:39.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi!
Dialogue: 0,0:07:40.56,0:07:43.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dulu kau adalah jenius di Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:43.72,0:07:45.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kini demi mayat wanita ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:46.28,0:07:48.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau berakhir dengan nasib malang.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:51.20,0:07:54.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau telah mencari seumur hidup ini namun tak mendapati.
Dialogue: 0,0:07:54.84,0:07:56.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi di ujung kehidupan ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:57.20,0:07:59.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,dengan membakar jiwa Primordial,
Dialogue: 0,0:07:59.60,0:08:00.51,Renegade,,600,600,0,,akhirnya mengerti.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:11.04,0:08:12.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ada sesuatu...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:13.16,0:08:14.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...akan datang!
Dialogue: 0,0:08:39.40,0:08:40.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Apa sebenarnya ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:41.52,0:08:42.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kekuatan apa ini?
Dialogue: 0,0:08:43.60,0:08:44.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:45.76,0:08:47.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...ini adalah Dao.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:48.16,0:08:50.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru pernah berkata, yang mendengar Dao...
Dialogue: 0,0:08:50.28,0:08:51.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...hidup dan mati di antara pagi dan malam.
Dialogue: 0,0:08:53.20,0:08:55.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ternyata inilah maknanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:14.00,0:09:17.00,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Zhou Yi | Tahap Ascendan
Dialogue: 0,0:09:24.16,0:09:25.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tahap Ascendan.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:26.16,0:09:27.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ting'er.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:27.72,0:09:31.36,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Akhirnya aku mengingatnya, mengingat segalanya.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:33.36,0:09:35.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sejak kecil aku memiliki bakat luar biasa.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:35.72,0:09:38.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seribu tahun lalu, aku berguru di bawah bimbingan Sekte Lima Elemen.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:39.60,0:09:41.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Semua orang berharap aku membanggakan sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:42.16,0:09:44.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Menjadi sosok besar di dunia kultivasi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:46.60,0:09:47.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saat Soul Formation.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:49.08,0:09:51.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru memberikanku Kuali.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:51.40,0:09:54.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Memungkinkan aku mencari kesempatan di dunia abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:09:55.76,0:09:56.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di dunia abadi,
Dialogue: 0,0:09:57.96,0:09:59.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku justru bertemu denganmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:01.00,0:10:03.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku kira ketertarikan ini karena aku mencintaimu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:05.12,0:10:07.03,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi kini aku akhirnya tahu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:07.92,0:10:10.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ketertarikan ini adalah yang kau paksa padaku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:11.08,0:10:13.77,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau memaksaku mengumpulkan Giok Abadi untuk melindungi tubuhmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:14.72,0:10:16.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Untuk menjaga tubuh abadi-mu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:16.68,0:10:18.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku mencuri Giok Abadi dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:20.08,0:10:22.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru sangat marah dan mengusirku dari sekte.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:23.32,0:10:24.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hingga saat guru gagal dalam pertarungan,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:24.88,0:10:27.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku tidak sempat bertemu lagi.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:28.96,0:10:30.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Budi baik guru,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:31.04,0:10:32.31,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tidak bisa terbalaskan.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:34.36,0:10:37.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku diam-diam bertindak untuk menyelamatkan Sekte Lima Elemen dari tiga bencana besar.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:38.40,0:10:39.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Agar hatiku tenang.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:42.12,0:10:43.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tak ada tempat bagiku di dunia ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:44.16,0:10:46.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku pergi mengembara bersamamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:47.00,0:10:50.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Baik penjahat besar maupun yang orang tak berguna,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:52.40,0:10:54.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,semua mengejekku.
Dialogue: 0,0:10:56.40,0:10:58.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dari penuh semangat dan percaya diri,
Dialogue: 0,0:10:58.80,0:11:01.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,menjadi bahan tertawaan di mata orang-orang.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:03.08,0:11:04.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pengertianku adalah cinta.

/ms terjemahkan ke inggris yang baik dan tidak terlalu formal:
Dialogue: 0,0:11:05.32,0:11:07.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hati Dao-ku adalah kamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:08.16,0:11:10.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dalam urusan dunia, mana ada yang bisa memuaskan semua pihak?
Dialogue: 0,0:11:10.96,0:11:13.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Seumur hidupku, Zhou Yi telah menyakiti terlalu banyak orang.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:14.56,0:11:15.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi satu-satunya yang tak ingin,..
Dialogue: 0,0:11:17.16,0:11:19.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...dan tidak akan aku sakiti adalah kamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:20.84,0:11:22.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Meskipun harus mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:22.76,0:11:24.43,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku rela melakukannya.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:26.24,0:11:27.79,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika masih ada reinkarnasi,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:29.40,0:11:31.11,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku akan memilih,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:31.96,0:11:33.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,untuk bertemu denganmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:41.96,0:11:42.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudara muda.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:44.00,0:11:45.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Setelah aku mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:45.76,0:11:47.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,tolong jaga istriku.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:47.92,0:11:48.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mau?
Dialogue: 0,0:11:51.28,0:11:53.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Zhou Yi sangat terkenal di Bintang Vermillion.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:54.28,0:11:55.23,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mayat wanita ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:11:55.56,0:11:56.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,pasti juga tidak sederhana.
Dialogue: 0,0:11:57.92,0:12:00.39,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika berita tentang mayat wanita ini tersebar,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:01.04,0:12:03.59,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku khawatir tidak akan ada kesempatan lagi untuk mewarisi posisi ketua klan.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:04.16,0:12:05.71,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi jika aku menolaknya,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:06.76,0:12:07.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku khawatir...
Dialogue: 0,0:12:10.16,0:12:10.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Junior.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:11.12,0:12:11.91,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bersedia.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:13.44,0:12:15.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau adalah wakil ketua dari Klan Raksasa.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:15.52,0:12:17.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tentunya ada kekhawatiran.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:17.52,0:12:19.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Takut mengikuti jejakku.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:20.32,0:12:21.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Baiklah.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:27.64,0:12:28.63,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:29.04,0:12:30.35,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sanggup membantuku.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:30.76,0:12:32.07,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Istriku,
Dialogue: 0,0:12:32.52,0:12:36.11,Renegade,,500,500,0,,setiap seribu tahun butuh seribu Giok Abadi untuk menjaga tubuhnya tetap seperti sedia kala.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:36.96,0:12:38.75,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ini agak sulit bagimu.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:39.48,0:12:40.27,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saudaraku.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:41.00,0:12:42.19,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mau membantuku?
Dialogue: 0,0:12:43.84,0:12:45.83,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku tidak bisa menjamin bisa mendapatkan sebanyak itu Giok Abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:12:47.72,0:12:51.87,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ribuan tahun tugas ini, aku tidak akan biarkan kau membantu secara percuma.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:47.68,0:13:48.95,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Di atas menara ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:13:49.26,0:13:51.20,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Terdapat aura yang kurasakan saat mencapai tahap Ascendant.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:52.21,0:13:53.47,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Mengorbankan menara ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:13:53.52,0:13:55.12,Renegade,,500,500,0,,Siapa pun dalam radius seratus li, kecuali yang sudah mencapai tahap Ascendant,
Dialogue: 0,0:13:55.61,0:13:57.06,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Tidak akan dapat mendekat.
Dialogue: 0,0:13:58.76,0:14:00.40,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ini adalah hadiah pertamaku.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:00.80,0:14:02.12,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kristal Ascendan.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:02.92,0:14:04.40,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Barang ini sekarang tidak berguna untukmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:04.84,0:14:08.67,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tapi jika ada hari kau mencapai Ascendan, ini akan membantumu.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:08.84,0:14:10.13,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Kristal Ascendan.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:10.48,0:14:13.15,Renegade,,600,600,0,,adalah para Ascendan yang mencapai pencerahan terhadap Dao Surgawi.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:13.40,0:14:14.64,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Sama berharganya dengan nyawa.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:15.08,0:14:16.80,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Memberikannya kepada orang lain adalah hal yang belum pernah terdengar.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:17.68,0:14:19.32,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika bisa mendapatkan barang ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:14:20.16,0:14:23.78,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku akan memiliki harapan untuk mencapai Ascendan di sisa hidupku.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:25.08,0:14:25.52,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tidak.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:26.44,0:14:28.44,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Harta pertama begitu berharga.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:28.92,0:14:30.44,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Apa masih ada yang kedua?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:30.48,0:14:31.05,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Atau bahkan ketiga?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:32.16,0:14:35.56,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hadiah keduaku adalah orang ini.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:36.76,0:14:38.00,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetua Agung dari Sekte Jiwa Mayat.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:38.56,0:14:39.72,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku tidak akan membunuhmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:40.24,0:14:42.60,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tetapi kau harus menjadi budak orang ini selama seribu tahun.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:43.32,0:14:45.70,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau, bersedia kan?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:47.80,0:14:49.68,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku tidak punya cukup umur seribu tahun.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:49.88,0:14:51.60,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Bagaimana bisa menjadi budaknya selama seribu tahun?
Dialogue: 0,0:14:52.60,0:14:54.56,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Soal umur, cari cara sendiri.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:55.20,0:14:58.52,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika hanya ingin mati, akan kukabulkan.
Dialogue: 0,0:14:59.36,0:15:02.40,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Gunakan kekuatanku untuk mengubahmu menjadi lebih lemah.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:02.40,0:15:03.20,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Tidak sulit.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:06.24,0:15:07.12,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Aku bersedia.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:11.52,0:15:13.12,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Segel budak ini sangat canggih.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:14.16,0:15:15.88,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Saat ini, aku hanya perlu menggerakkan pikiran.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:16.76,0:15:18.08,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Maka, ahli Soul Transformation ini
Dialogue: 0,0:15:18.80,0:15:20.80,Renegade,,600,600,0,,akan menghancurkan jiwa dan mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:23.64,0:15:24.92,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Pelayan, Sun Tai.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:25.32,0:15:26.56,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hormat kepada Tuan.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:27.24,0:15:29.32,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Ahli Soul Transformation sebagai pelayan,
Dialogue: 0,0:15:31.72,0:15:33.12,Renegade,,600,600,0,,di bintang Vermillion ini,
Dialogue: 0,0:15:33.32,0:15:34.40,Renegade,,600,600,0,,selain Negara Vermillion,
Dialogue: 0,0:15:34.72,0:15:36.80,Renegade,,600,600,0,,bukankah seharusnya aku bisa menguasai semuanya?
Dialogue: 0,0:15:38.76,0:15:40.00,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jaga dia baik-baik.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:43.52,0:15:44.52,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Guru!
Dialogue: 0,0:15:45.28,0:15:46.56,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Murid tidak berbakti.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:47.16,0:15:48.92,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dalam hidup ini, aku merasa berdosa padamu.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:49.76,0:15:51.04,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Jika ada kehidupan setelah mati,
Dialogue: 0,0:15:52.04,0:15:53.64,Renegade,,600,600,0,,aku akan membalasmu.
Dialogue: 0,0:15:59.04,0:15:59.84,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau...
Dialogue: 0,0:16:01.08,0:16:02.36,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...tidak akan mati.
Dialogue: 0,0:16:21.16,0:16:22.40,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Satu pedang hujan.
Dialogue: 0,0:16:22.74,0:16:23.34,Renegade,,0,0,0,,Keluar.
Dialogue: 0,0:16:38.28,0:16:39.00,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Dia...
Dialogue: 0,0:16:39.80,0:16:41.44,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...siapa sebenarnya dia?
Dialogue: 0,0:16:47.28,0:16:48.12,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Inilah...
Dialogue: 0,0:16:48.76,0:16:49.92,Renegade,,600,600,0,,...Pedang Abadi.
Dialogue: 0,0:16:59.44,0:17:01.52,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Telah melindungi diriku selama lebih dari dua ribu tahun.
Dialogue: 0,0:17:01.84,0:17:02.44,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Kau,
Dialogue: 0,0:17:03.12,0:17:04.04,Renegade,,600,600,0,,telah berjasa.
Dialogue: 0,0:17:05.72,0:17:07.72,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Hari ini, aku akan menjadikanmu sebagai jiwa pedang.
Dialogue: 0,0:17:09.12,0:17:10.48,Renegade,,600,600,0,,Setelah ribuan tahun diberi nutrisi,
Dialogue: 0,0:17:11.52,0:17:12.88,Renegade,,600,600,0,,kau akan diakui sebagai Dewa Abadi.

you

you

Cool

Xiao Yan
